channel.itunes:subtitle: The ONLY podcast show to come from London & LA

item.title: CLD112 Happy New Year
item.description:
CLD112 Happy New Year everybody!!!! 

Jonathan and Gabe are re-united in Los Angeles to kick start the new year.

Gabe's new year began with a bang but it's a rocky road that's drying out fast.

Jonathan's started with a pop and has hit a stop.

The boys are planning the whole of 2010 in close detail, listen in, you might just learn somethin...

item.title: CLD111 Is Gabe Smarter than a 5th Grader
item.description: CLD111 They're back! It's Gabe's birthday, but as usual his birthday plans may not run smoothly and Jonathan isn't helping. Someone with Gabe's brain power surely could manage to organise a simple birthday party right??? This show is for Ashley who we are thinking of lots and love very much. X

item.title: CLD110 With Signing for the Deaf
item.description: Show 110 Gabe is LIVE in the room next to his latest hot thing. We get the yoga low-down before the moves have even finished. Jonathan has gym guy lust and dilemma with what to do about it. But above all, Gabe thoughtfully and sensitively provides signing for all deaf listeners....

item.title: CLD108 Gays With Guns
item.description:
Show 108 The boys have been VERY busy and dish the details on their TV drag debut, shooting with real big scary guns, the perils of the Los Angeles Zoo and all of the drunken fun they got up to on St Pattys.
PLUS Jonathan and Gabe catch up with Nelson Melegrito, founder of DIVA and find out all about what his organization do and his new charity project.
Gabe tries to be gaycist, but it won't wash with Jonathan. Then he resorts to chemical warfare. It's a rootin' tootin' jam packed show!
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and L.A. -AT THE SAME TIME

item.title: CLD107 CLD Turns 3 at an Oscar Party
item.description: Show 107 Happy Birthday us!!! Jonathan & Gabe celebrate CLD's 3rd birthday together at Jennifer Love Hewitt's big Oscars bash in West Hollywood. The most guests ever on one show- Jennifer Love Hewitt, Actress Jane Lynch, Niecy Nash from Reno 911, Candis Cayne from Dirty Sexy Money all take time out from partying to tell the boys everything they have to say about the Oscars and who they are supporting. THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and L.A. -AT THE SAME TIME

item.title: CLD106 Do You Want To Get Famous?
item.description: Show 106 Do You Want To Get Famous???? Jonathan & Gabe get to meet Howard Bragman, author of new book Where's My Fifteen Minutes? No one knows Hollywood better than Howard Bragman. For more than thirty years he has helped movie stars, celebrities and business leaders get their messages out, in good times and bad. The boys head out on a mission to meet Howard and get some showbiz tips. THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and L.A. -AT THE SAME TIME. CHECK OUT THE BOOK www.wheresmyfifteenminutes.com

item.title: CLD104 Thanksrimming Special
item.description:
Ah, the holidays. Wholesome family times of togetherness...Jonathan is definitely relaxing into the holiday spirit, or should that be honesty spirit? This week it might be TMI, even for CLD listeners.
Gabe is feeling magical at this time of year, so much so that even without the California wild fires, he may well still go up in a puff of smoke.
Plus seasonal shoplifting tips -the Calling Long Distance way.
CATCH UP WITH THE BOYS NOW!!!
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and L.A. -AT THE SAME TIME.

item.title: CLD100 KATHY GRIFFIN - 100TH SHOW SPECIAL
item.description: It's show 100!!! and double Emmy winner Kathy Griffin joins Jonathan and Gabe EXCLUSIVELY to celebrate their comedy milestone! Kathy lets the boys in on all her gossip from the Emmys, her TWO nominations and just what she thinks right now of 'sober' Britney, 'singing' Christina and 'tits n hair' Jessica Simpson. CATCH UP WITH KATHY AND THE BOYS NOW IN THE CALLING LONG DISTANCE SHOW 100 SPECIAL!!!!! THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and L.A. -AT THE SAME TIME. item.title: CLD94 Wake Up Call
item.description:
Show Ninety Four - Gabe gets an early morning call he doesn't really want. Is that banging on the door the angry hubby of his secret local lover??? OR someone who wants to remove more than his Hollywood smile???
Jonathan does little to comfort Gabe in his hour of need, he's got a busy new temp job to manage, it's tough at the top OK!?
CATCH UP WITH THE BOYS NOW!!!!
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and L.A. -AT THE SAME TIME.

item.title: CLD90 Our Life on the V-List
item.description:
Show Ninety - The boys are trying to keep it classy. Classy the whole way through, but one of 'em slips up, what did you expect? - it's windy in London right now.
Gabe gets to the real nitty-gritty of just what life is like on the V-List. Virtual fame ain't all it's cracked up to be - even in Hollywood.
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and LOS ANGELES-AT THE SAME TIME!

item.title: CLD89 Britney and a Bottle
item.description:
Show Eighty-Nine - It's a Too Bad Tuesday and things aren't going quite to plan for the boys whilst they're together in LA.
Gabe has a dating disappointment and despite the Simon Cowell-esque accent, Jonathan can't get into American Idol studio.
Secret project filming is rained off as the boys are stuck in their pee-green accommodation.
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON and LOS ANGELES-AT THE SAME TIME!

item.title: CLD88 Happy Birthday Calling Long Distance
item.description:
Show Eighty-Eight Calling Long Distance is TWO YEARS YOUNG!!!
Jonathan is feeling a little hoarse, but Gabe has no time for livestock, he's got yoga on the brain, but he's just not sure where it came from.
Jonathan suffered a personal explosion on public transport and blames his temp job for his lack of yoga with the men folk of London.
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON & LOS ANGELES-AT THE SAME TIME!

item.title: CLD87 Hello Hollywood
item.description:
Show Eighty-Seven It's the ALL NEW Calling Long Distance from London and Los Angeles!
Gabe updates everyone on LA life so far and ALL of the A-listers he's been meeting, where he's living n just what's crackin for a busy boy about town down LA way.
Jonathan is sick, sick from a cold and sick of his new temp job, which just isn't going to plan. But the two keep their spirits high as usual with their hopes of global entertainment fame.
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON & LOS ANGELES-AT THE SAME TIME!

item.title: CLD86 So Long San Francisco
item.description:
WE'RE BACK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Show Eighty Six - The VERY LAST CALLING LONG DISTANCE from San Francisco. Gabe says good bye to his hometown SF as he packs up his car for new adventures in LA for 08.
Jonathan DOES tell all about his Don't Ask Don't Tell US Airforce fun on New Years Eve and just how the hell did Gabe end up at his EX-boyfriends place???
It's great to be back! And all new for 08.
So, for the very last time....
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON & SAN FRANCISCO -AT THE SAME TIME

item.title: CLD82 Crystal Tina
item.description:
Show Eighty-Two Not a code name, Crystal Tina is Cher's other daughter! Gabe makes a mean drunk and Jonathan has got his finger on the ejector seat button. The boys barely make it through this weeks show due to sobriety. YES! They are sober! It IS Sobriety November! Listen and find out why, with whom and for how long, and figure out why 12 days feels like three weeks!
THE ONLY SHOW TO COME FROM LONDON & SAN FRANCISCO-AT THE SAME TIME!

item.title: CLD1 From London and San Francisco!

Listen in as they try and introduce themselves, as the show goes on the best friends can't agree on exactly how they first met and why they ended up on different parts of the planet?????
